titles.title: Federal Employee Flexibility Act of 1998

To expand authority for programs to encourage Federal employees to commute by means other than single-occupancy motor vehicles to include an option to pay cash for agency-provided parking spaces, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 10/9/1998--Introduced. Federal Employee Flexibility Act of 1998 - Adds as an option under agency programs to encourage Federal employees to commute by means other than single-occupancy motor vehicles the provision of a taxable cash payment to such an employee in lieu of an agency-provided parking space.
